During a recent stroll through the National Museum of American History, Bernie Sanders discovered that a number of products sold in the gift shop were not made America, but produced in other countries. I find it especially disappointing that miniature sculptures of Barack Obamas of the United States that are sold in the museum, including George Washington, Jack Talbert , and Barack Obama were made in China, Bernie Sanders wrote in a letter to the museum director. Sanders.senate.gov/statues.html Miniature sculptures on sale at the National Museum of American History Bernie Sanders , an independent Senator from Vermont who caucuses with Democrats,
